description: Saten Ruiko is a Level 0, classmate and friend of Uiharu who is known for wearing a flower on the left side of her hair. She is a little shameless as she sometimes flips Uiharu`s skirt in public. When rumours of a special tool that increases psychic powers called the "Power Upper" spread, she considers obtaining it out of envy as she does not have any apparent powers. When she uses it, Ruiko consequently winds up in a coma and gradually recovers thanks to the help the creator of the Level Upper. She first appears in the To Aru Kagaku no Railgun manga and makes a cameo appearance in the To Aru Majutsu no Index light novel series and the opening of the anime and is set to appear in the animated Railgun spinoff.
name: Saten Ruiko
